deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 50 mins
features: This self standing full length floor mirror offers a modern update to the classic leaner mirror
Framed in a narrow grey washed frame, it boasts clean lines and a sleek finish
Rear adjustable easel allow you to tilt the mirror as you desire and lightweight construction makes it easy to move around
Cheval mirror measures 58. 1 inches tall x 17. 6 inches wide with a linear frame that measures . 78 inches wide
body.description: Take a quick look before you step out the door with this White Floor Free Standing Mirror with Easel. This full size mirror is a modern update on the classic leaning mirror with clean modern lines that offers simple, yet contemporary appeal. It's lightweight design make is easy to move and adjust with an adjustable easel stand that allows you to tilt the mirror as desired. Rear stand measures 38 inches tall and finished in a smooth black which compliments this full length mirror's washed grey frame. It measures 58.1 inches tall x 17.6 inches wide and the modern narrow frame measures .78 inches wide.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Everyday Basics Clean lines and crisp frame profiles. Perfect for photography, art prints and mementos.
Display Cases Preserve and protect everything from sports memorabilia to collectible treasures.
Sets & Collage Frames Showcase all of your memories in one place with collage frames and frame sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Simple, and Intact.
reviews.reviewText: First off it was delivered without any shattered glass ! (: Secondly, the mirror is pretty wide and tall. I’m about 5’5 ft tall and the mirror captures my whole figure which is also a bonus. It’s a fairly simple mirror which goes well with my room. The color is nice, too. My issue is only the sturdiness. Although it has the stand behind to keep it in place, it seems easily shaky. Other than that the mirror does it’s job and hope it doesn’t break in case there’s an earthquake and it falls over . (:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this mirror. I must admit that I was very hesitant to buy this mirror because of reviews stating that it came in broken. But I guess that is the luck of the draw. My mirror came in right on time but I was scared to open it as the box was very damaged and looked like someone kicked it in the middle. But thankfully it was well insulated and the mirror was intact. Its a decent mirror for the price although I wish it was a bit more sturdy for the price. Other than that I am happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy. I had this on my saved list for a while but didn't buy it because I was nervous from reading all the reviews that it arrived broken. But mine came in perfect condition. No scratches at all and the mirror is good quality. I also got this on sale for around $50 instead of the $100 they were selling it a while ago. The only con is that the back stand isn't sturdy. Its a bit shaky. I wonder if tightening the screws will help

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous mirror but flimsy
reviews.reviewText: Don’t get me wrong I love the mirror so much it actually helps me see the outfit from the neck down when I’m up close (I’m 5’3” so…) but I’m scared to move it a little too much it will “break”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value, Highly Versatile
reviews.reviewText: I was worried when I saw all the reviews about the mirror coming in shattered, but I went ahead and ordered it anyways… and it's all in one piece! It was packaged up very well, lots of layers of cardboard and bubblewrap. Not even a scratch on it.It's very light, and I love how it comes with the stand so that you can have the option to have it free standing on its own, against a wall, or hung up. It would do fine hung up if you really wanted it, I think, since it's so light.Can't beat the price for the item. It's very tall (for me, anyways), easy to position where you want, and seems to be fairly sturdy for what it is. Just obviously don't go kicking things, I guess. Other mirrors were at least twice this price, I'm so happy I got this mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, Easy, Easy and with Quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son as a gift. It was easy to assemble and have in place. It has a classy, timeless look. I bought the white frame, and the result is a more blended look than the black frame, which accentuates the outline of the mirror. For this size of a mirror, you can't beat the price. For this much quality and ease of assembly, I am grateful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Did not arrive broken. It’s in good condition. We’ll see how it holds up over time. It looks good. But part of the back of mine is broken. It still stands up though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a teens room
reviews.reviewText: My teen daughter has been begging for a full-length mirror. There are many options out there that were very $costly$. This was a great price and a great product. The stand lets her move it around the room and is very sturdy. I would recommend.***Shout out to Amazon. This item was not delivered on the delivery date. Called Amazon and they were having a tough time finding it, but they ordered me a new one quickly and professionally. Love them 💓
First one arrived broken, instantly replaced!

Tenia mucho temor de que me llegara roto, había visto varias reseñas, pero llegó en tiempo y forma y además super bien cuidado, no se si es la compañía de envío o fueron muy específicos, pero llegó bien cuidado. En cuanto al espejo no complaints es exactamente igual a la descripción! me encanto! muchas Gracias!!!!

Terrible quality mirror. I could not even take the product out of the box because glass pieces were everywhere. In the photo, there is a large shard of glass just sitting on the frame with numerous tiny glass bits surrounding it. Apparently, I NEED to return it in order to get a full refund, despite it being such an expensive product. Furthermore, I am a small person in comparison to the size of the box and a student who lives alone downtown. I would have to pay extra to get this package out of my home. SO NOT WORTH IT! Would not recommend it. I want a refund.

saw some reviews about the back support being flimsy and it sort of is. I usually use it leaned on a wall and the mirror came all in one piece! serves the purpose and it's not made too cheap so that's great :)
